Funeral Loss Madonna & Child Prayer Sympathy Cards

Big Deals! Funeral Loss Madonna & Child Prayer Sympathy Cards – Sympathy Cards Popular Funeral Loss Madonna & Child Prayer Sympathy Cards It’s a great choice Funeral Loss Madonna & Child Prayer Sympathy Cards It’s in stock and ready to ship. Sacred Remembrance: Vintage Madonna & Child Funeral Prayer Card

In honor of your cherished departed loved one and their reverence for the divine, we present our heartfelt Vintage Madonna & Child Funeral Prayer Card. This poignant design features a timeless vintage painting of the Madonna and Child, emanating love and serenity. Amidst this sacred depiction, a cherished photo of your loved one adorns the card, serving as a beautiful tribute to their memory.

️ Embrace Divine Comfort: Amidst the serene beauty of the vintage Madonna and Child, find solace in the comforting embrace of divine grace. Our prayer card serves as a beacon of hope, guiding grieving hearts towards inner peace and serenity as they navigate the journey of loss.

Personalized Tribute: On the back of the card, there’s space for your loved one’s name and dates, serving as a heartfelt tribute to their memory and their reverence for the divine. Below, ample room is provided for funeral poems, verses, or prayers, allowing you to customize the card with words of remembrance and reflection.

Eternal Remembrance: As the vintage Madonna and Child radiate with love and serenity, may they also represent the cherished memories of your departed loved one’s spirit. May their memory be a source of comfort and inspiration, guiding you through moments of remembrance and reflection.

Guiding Light: Just as the Madonna and Child embody love and serenity, may their image serve as a guiding light during your journey of grief. The presence of this sacred depiction honors the memory of your loved one and represents their enduring impact on those who knew them.

Heartfelt Tribute: Honor the legacy of your loved one with heartfelt funeral poems, verses, or prayers on the back of the card. This personalized tribute is a meaningful way to express your love and gratitude for their reverence for the divine and their cherished memory.

️ Everlasting Love: As you hold this prayer card in your hands, may it serve as a reminder of the enduring love and cherished memories you shared with your departed loved one. May it bring you comfort and peace, knowing that their spirit lives on in the love and serenity of the Madonna and Child and in your heart forever.

Embrace the sacred beauty of the Vintage Madonna & Child Funeral Prayer Card: a tribute to love, serenity, and everlasting remembrance. Price:$34.95
